howToPlay.title: How to Play Block Blast?
howToPlay.subTitle: Jump right into your Block Blast adventure with these simple steps:

items.text: Your goal is to place blocks of different colors and shapes on a fixed board.
When a row or column is completely filled, the blocks will disappear, earning you points.
The more blocks you remove and the longer combo chains you create, the higher your score will be.
The game ends when the board is completely filled, leaving no space for additional blocks.

items.question: How to achieve a high score?
items.answer: Before placing any block, analyze the board and anticipate upcoming blocks. Visualize which rows or columns will fill up soon. Start from the corners to maximize space for larger blocks. Aim to remove multiple rows or columns simultaneously to create combos and gain bonus points.

items.question: Is there a time limit?
items.answer: No, Block Blast is a relaxing puzzle game without a time limit, allowing you to plan your moves at your own pace.

items.question: Can I play Block Blast offline?
items.answer: Yes, Block Blast can be played offline, making it a perfect game for when you're on the go.

items.question: Are there any in-app purchases?
items.answer: Block Blast is free to play with optional in-app purchases for cosmetic enhancements and additional features.
